TitleEnglish: I'm a Noble on the Brink of Ruin, So I Might as Well Try Mastering Magic
SummaryEnglish: While innocently enjoying himself after work, one man’s life changes forever. He wakes in the body of Liam Hamilton, the youngest son of a noble house on the brink of collapse. Amid the chaos, Liam realizes he finally has time to learn and practice magic. Once he begins, it takes his life for an even bigger turn. Can Liam master magic and save his noble family? The aristocratic fantasy begins!
Aliases: Botsuraku Yotei no Kizoku dakedo, Hima datta kara Mahō wo Kiwamete Mita
Botsuraku Yotei no Kizoku dakedo, Hima datta kara Mahou wo Kiwamete Mita
I Am a Noble about to Be Ruined, but Reached the Summit of Magic Because I Had a Lot of Free Time.
Botsuraku Yotei no Kizoku dakedo, Hima Datta kara Mahou wo Kiwametemita

1.TitleEnglish: Liam Tries Using Magic For the First Time
1.SummaryEnglish: Liam is an office worker in another world and does not know how he got there. In this new realm, he takes over the body of Liam, the fifth son of a noble family that's about to lose its status, although that doesn't concern him. In this world, magic exists, and he can learn to wield it.

2.SummaryEnglish: Albrevit seems worried about the idea of Liam wanting to succeed his father, so he decides to introduce him to the Hunters' Association, where the young magic enthusiast will soon earn recognition.

3.TitleEnglish: Liam Tries Talking to a Dragon Fiend
3.SummaryEnglish: The eldest of the Hamilton brothers is beside himself over Liam's progress. He tries to accomplish great feats himself, but in the process, he makes a grave mistake.

4.TitleEnglish: Liam Tries Taking an Elf Familiar
4.SummaryEnglish: Radon asks Liam to protect some fairies from a forest, as their wings are highly coveted. As part of the process, his magic continues to evolve.

5.TitleEnglish: Liam Tries Getting Engaged to the Princess
5.SummaryEnglish: Liam and the elves continue building their village in the Promised Land, which attracts the attention of monsters and humans alike.

6.SummaryEnglish: Liam continues to build his nation's strength by recruiting a group of trolls and learning to recreate Radon's magic battle armor.

7.SummaryEnglish: Liam's village is threatened by a massive horde of vampires led by a Dracula.

8.TitleEnglish: Liam Tries Becoming King of the Promised Land
8.SummaryEnglish: Those under the Dracula's rule have been saved. Liam is now king, recognized by both the people and the surrounding countries.

9.TitleEnglish: Liam Tries Talking to a Girl
9.SummaryEnglish: Lady Flora's visit is interrupted by an exploding monster.

10.TitleEnglish: Liam Tries Creating and Playing in an Ocean
10.SummaryEnglish: Liam finds a way for his citizens to procure their own water and salt.

11.TitleEnglish: Liam Tries Building a Magic City
11.SummaryEnglish: Liam stays in his kingdom while Jamil watches him to ensure he doesn't interfere with the drought, so Jamil gets an idea.

12.SummaryEnglish: The dragon knights of Quistador request an audience with Liam.
